solution_line_template: Danai places {num_skulls} skulls + {num_broomsticks} broomsticks + {num_spiderwebs} spiderwebs + {num_cauldrons} cauldron = <<{num_skulls}+{num_broomsticks}+{num_spiderwebs}+{num_cauldrons}={initial_decorations}>>{initial_decorations} decorations.

She also puts up twice as many pumpkins around the house as she put spiderwebs, {num_spiderwebs} x {multiplier_pumpkins} = <<{num_spiderwebs}*{multiplier_pumpkins}={num_pumpkins}>>{num_pumpkins} pumpkins.
Danai will also add {budget_left} + {left_to_put_up} decorations to the {initial_decorations} + {num_pumpkins} decorations already up = 83 total decorations Danai will put up.
